title: Revo Uninstaller Pro v3.1.6 + Patch
description:
Revo Uninstaller Pro v3.1.6 + Patch



Revo Uninstaller Pro innovative uninstall manager, that lets you uninstall, delete, remove programs and solve uninstalling problems. It helps you to uninstall and remove unwanted programs installed on your computer even if you have problems uninstalling and cannot uninstall them from â€œWindows Add or Remove Programsâ€ control panel applet. Revo Uninstaller is a much faster and more powerful alternative to â€œWindows Add or Remove Programsâ€ applet! With its advanced and fast algorithm, this program analyzes an applicationâ€™s data before uninstall and scans after you uninstall an application. After the programâ€™s regular uninstaller runs, you can remove additional unnecessary files, folders and registry keys that are usually left over on your computer.

Even if you have a broken installation, Revo Uninstaller scans for an applicationâ€™s data on your hard disk drives and in the Windows registry and shows all found files, folders and registry keys so you can delete them.

Revo Uninstaller gives you another 8 handy and powerful tools to clean up your system. With its unique â€œHunter modeâ€, Revo Uninstaller offers you some simple, easy to use, but effective and powerful approaches to manage (uninstall, stop, delete, disable from auto starting) and to get information about your installed and/or running programs.


Features:


â€¢ Auto Start Manager â€“ Stop programs that start automatically on Windows startup; speed up loading of Windows!
â€¢ Windows Tools Manager â€“ Handy and useful tools bundled with every version of Windows; easily find useful system tools and options!
â€¢ Junk Files Cleaner â€“ Find and remove unnecessary files from your computer; free up disk space and delete files you do not need!
â€¢ Browsers History Cleaner â€“ Erase web browser history, visited pages history and temporary internet files of Internet Explorer, Firefox, Netscape and Opera web browsers; free up a lot of disk space by deleting temporary internet files like temporary saved videos, temporary flash files, temporary pictures etc!
â€¢ Office History Cleaner â€“ Remove the history of most recently used files in MS Office; remove your tracks by deleting the list of last opened MS Office documents!
â€¢ Windows History Cleaner â€“ Remove the history of recently opened files, delete temporary files, remove usage tracks and other history items that are saved by Windows; remove your tracks saved by Windows for a lot of operations!
â€¢ Unrecoverable Delete Tool â€“ Erase files and folders forever; be sure that nobody could recover your files and folders after deleting!
â€¢ Evidence Remover â€“ Make sure already deleted files, folders and other data are unrecoverable; securely erase your data!


What's New in This Release?


* Fixed Minor bugs
* Improved Scanning for leftovers


Requirements:


OS: XP, 2003, Vista, Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10.


Install Notes:


==> Install Program
==> After Install Don't Launch/Run Application
==> Disable/Push Your "Antivirus Protection"
==> Unpack "Patch.rar" archive
==> Run & Apply Patch
==> Enjoy
